did.abstract: This is a comprehensive collection of reports, background studies and correspondence on matters pertaining to Saratoga Springs transportation issues, particularly the bypass route, truck routes, traffic law enforcement strategies and related data.

accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection may be subject to Copyright Laws.

bioghist.p: Lewis Benton III (1944-) was Commission of Public Safety, 1988-1995; chair of the City Planning Board, 2002-2007; a member of the City Charter Revision Committee, 2000-2001; chair of the Saratoga Springs Downtown Transportation Plan Advisory Committee, 2005-2006.
In addition, he chaired the Saratoga Springs Public Safety Capital Construction Committee, 2006-2009.
In 1992, as Commissioner of Public Safety, he designed and implemented the Saratoga Springs Fire Departmentâ€™s demand for a responsive emergency medical service system.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains personal reports, histories, correspondence, records and minutes of the Charter Revision Commission, 2000-2001; the Saratoga Springs Public Safety Capital Construction Committee, 2006-2007 and the Saratoga Springs Downtown Transportation Plan initiative.
